  • Classes in net.minecraftforge.common used by net.minecraft.block 
    Class and Description
    EnumPlantType 
    IPlantable 
    IShearable
    This allows for mods to create there own Shear-like items and have them interact with Blocks/Entities without extra work.
  • Classes in net.minecraftforge.common used by net.minecraft.entity 
    Class and Description
    IExtendedEntityProperties
    Allows for custom entity data and logic to be hooked to existing entity classes.
  • Classes in net.minecraftforge.common used by net.minecraft.entity.item 
    Class and Description
    IMinecartCollisionHandler
    This class defines a replacement for the default minecart collision code.
